hooks.clean: find . -d -not -name ".." -not -name "." -not -name "*.json" -not -name "main.py" -not -name "function.*" -not -name "requirements.txt" | xargs rm -fr &> /dev/null && find . -type f -name "*.py" -name "*.so" -not -name "*.json" -not -name "main.py" -not -name "function.*" -not -name "requirements.txt" | xargs rm -fr &> /dev/null
